body_html: To make this issue more constructive, I think it would be useful it TensorFlow would check for instructions it requires on the CPU first, and print an error if they are missing. Similarly how it currently says that some instructions are available but not compiled against. Then it would be easier to differentiate between bugs and simply not using correct binary for a given CPU.

body: To make this issue more constructive, I think it would be useful it TensorFlow would check for instructions it requires on the CPU first, and print an error if they are missing. Similarly how it currently says that some instructions are available but not compiled against. Then it would be easier to differentiate between bugs and simply not using correct binary for a given CPU.
